blogs.Title: Recursion By Kanav
blogs.body:
RECURSION- PART 1

This part aims at developing basic idea behind recursion. Next part aims at writing backtracking solutions, some tree problems and Dynamic Programming.

“The first step, known as the base case, is to prove the given statement for the first natural number. The second step, known as the inductive step, is to prove that the given statement for any one natural number implies the given statement for the next natural number. From these two steps, mathematical induction is the rule from which we infer that the given statement is established for all natural numbers.”

Below is the pseudo-code for a recursive function that returns true if the given array is sorted in non-decreasing order and false otherwise.
